title: Royal Enfield Buyback Offer: Get up to 80% value of your bullet. Here's how
description: Royal Enfield, in collaboration with OTO Capital, has introduced the 'Assured Buyback Program', a first-of-its-kind initiative in the motorcycle industry. This program aims to enhance the growth of the mid-size motorcycle segment in India and offers customers a hassle-free experience with flexible tenure options and lower EMIs. With a guaranteed buyback value of up to 77 per cent and cashback incentives, customers have the option to trade, retain, or return their motorcycles at the end of the tenure.
